channel.title: 667/720 Help
channel.description:
Hi, i'm working on HumidityX currently.
I removed all the anti-leeches from it.
The only problem I have now is when the player gets killed by an NPC they don't respawn.
I'm not asking to be spoonfed or anything, but can anyone let me know what file I can fix this in?
I've looked in almost all of them.. Player.java, combat, npccombat, npc, i've checked all the sendDeath and eveything looks normal..
Can anyone help me please?

item.title: 667/720 Help
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

i need help on this too, ive looked everywer but cant find it

Read full topic

@martinalbo wrote:

where’s that located?

I’ve check controlermanager, controler, player.java

everything looks normal…

Read full topic

item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

Look at the DeathEvent controller… Your Welcome

Read full topic
